pages.text: $(li)Layout guide shows you the factory layout and can step through each y-level$(li)Layout guide and Factory Heart are directional$(li)Use the Intern on the heart to autobuild$(li)Factory needs Conatus Fluid to run, but no power

$(li)Some mobs need ingredients to generate loot$(li)Intern can also validate your factory structure$(li)Mobs have a minimum tier of factory to spawn$(li)Must apply all the previous tiers of a perk to use higher tier ones
